website_summaries.verdict: Skateboarders or not, everyone appreciates the ease of slip-on sneakers. Emerica has a perfect way of delivering an ideal skateboarding shoe that performs without the complicated lacing and unlacing. Say hi to the Emerica Wino G6 Slip-On.Equipped with the G6 insole, it has sufficient padding for comfort and impact protection. Also, it has a vulcanized outsole that delivers excellent board feel and steady-footed grip. Apart from the unrivaled performance, it also offers the right combination of comfort and style.
pros: According to many customers, the Emerica Wino G6 Slip-On has a stylish and versatile design that can match casual and business outfits
Some skateboarders have attested that this shoe offers a fantastic board feel
Equipped with the G6 insole, it has sufficient padding for effective impact protection, attested by a few users
A couple of testers have noted that it is a skate shoe that provides support even for people with wide feet
The Wino G6 Slip-On from Emerica is durable and well-built, as per several buyers
Most wearers have testified that it is a comfortable shoe perfect not only for skateboarding but also for walking
It is among the best slip-on sneakers for skateboarding compared to slip-on Vans and DC shoes, according to a significant number of reviewers
cons: It needs a couple of weeks to loosen, according to a couple of users
A reviewer has mentioned that the Emerica Wino G6 Slip-On offers little resistance

customer_reviews.title: tough
customer_reviews.text: best slip on ever? I think so and Ive had vans pro model slip ons (not the cheapo ones) dc trase slip on and this is my favorite, and I think this is Jon Dickson's pro model which is a plus because he is awesome. I know it doesnt look like it but I HAVE been skating in these though one almost has to zoom in to see any damage
customer_reviews.author: JustJim

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy shoes, maybe order a 1/2 size up mine were tight.
customer_reviews.text: I have been loving slip ons lately, vans and Kung fu slippers, so I got these to take on a trip to Thailand and Japan. Temples and some businesses have you take off your shoes so slip ons were the way to go. They seem really well made, but they are a little small. I wear 10 in vans and converse, these were a little tight to where I can put them on, but they are not as comfy as they should be. Maybe just check sizing, other than that they seem great! I still have been wearing them, so not that big a deal, but I wish I would’ve ordered a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Thrasher_ftw

customer_reviews.title: Slip on cupsole with great boardfeel.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish slip on skate shoe. I can’t speak to the durability because I haven’t skated them very long but I can say the boardfeel is great. The shoe is a little narrow just behind the toebox but this helps the shoe stay on. So I would say sizing is true with a narrow spot. Minimal ankle protection but it is a low shoe after all...good price point for a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of red sneakers I wore out. Couldn't find any that seemed as good, until these. They fit perfectly and they are my new favorite pair of shoes. I like them so much I would be a company spokesperson.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Press

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy the expensive one!! It's the REAL EMERICA.
customer_reviews.text: You have to lay out almost $70 for the real deal. I have been reading reviews of this shoe, and the pictures of the bad reviewed shoe are pictures of fake Emericas. I always buy my son the "Wino" slip ons. He was a semi-pro street skater, and he absolutely loves these slip ons.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I know these shoes would be perfect. Good price also
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn emerica for years and these slip ons May need to be ordered in half a size up . For example ; I wear 10 . Get 10.5. !! Seriously uncomfortably tight on my feet . Hoping they’ll break in . Otherwise I know these shoes would be perfect . Good price also
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ptak

customer_reviews.title: Well Built & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing these for more than a month now and they're his favorite. They've held up well, still look new, very sturdy and he says they're comfortable. Would certainly recommend & purchase these shoes again... Sino G6 slip-ons
customer_reviews.author: Perry D

customer_reviews.title: Favorite slip on
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great. I skate here and there but do a lot of kickflip sand Ollies when ever I skate and so far they lasting a while. Might be just me but the side of the shoe dogged into my right foot so I had to burn it off and break them in. Overall this show is good for daily activities and skating.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite pair of shoes. I love wearing them with my cutoff shorts and I wear them with chinos to work often. I'm definitely buying another pair or 2. These are more comfortable than my vans slip ons.
customer_reviews.author: Montage10

customer_reviews.title: Dirt on shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable . Nice color . Hard leather that feels rough . I bought these use around the house . I wouldn’t pay more than $30 . There were dirt stains on the back of the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ervin Arlington

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box, took little time to break in. I mistook the material for leather, it's actually something like synthetic suede. The shoes soil pretty quickly and I haven't found a good way to clean them. But despite the material, I'm very happy with them as they still look good and they're pretty good for walking and skateboarding.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: nice! only thing i didnt like was the velvet texture of the shoe gets stained fast!
customer_reviews.author: Meows_Meows

customer_reviews.title: Best slip ons!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and style. Very comfortable! Love these will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: It came to small had to return and get the right size
customer_reviews.author: Connie B. Dauphinais

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, and great for skating
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes to skate or just wear casually, dont have much ankle support but theyre slip ons so I didnt expect much. Really good board feel and my feet never slip off. I have 3 pairs two in this color and one in the stone suede. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loves the shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them. There the right size and fits good.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes. My first time to buy emerica shoe product. Fits well. Its kinda snug trying to get the feet. But after a few more tries and perhaps more break in period it will be easier. This is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bongski55

customer_reviews.title: They are starting to fall a part after two days ...
customer_reviews.text: They are starting to fall a part after two days of using them . I want to return them but my son has no another shoes to skate with so I guess I am just going as a loss. they really should not be called skate shoes but thankes anyways.
customer_reviews.author: debbie bowen

customer_reviews.title: Feel better then the slipon vans and looks much better
customer_reviews.text: Badass shoes. Feel better then the slipon vans and looks much better.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Skate In These
customer_reviews.text: I skate street, park, and transition in these and they hold up. Durable and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the sneaker, they seem very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Harry A. Jones Jr.

customer_reviews.title: falling apart
customer_reviews.text: These are only a few weeks old (Oct 7 - 24) and the trim is falling apart. Really surprising that such poor quality product is being sold without stronger warnings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 🙈🙈🙈🙈
customer_reviews.text: Shoes a very good I’ve always like Emerica. Definitely get a half size bigger. Great buy. Soles to stick out wider then the shoe but I like it because I do skate. Purpose for purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: really easy to break in with nice board feel. great durable shoe for skating.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Reviewing the Vegan model.
customer_reviews.text: I got the coated canvas. Very Vegan, good fit, flick and protection for a slip-on. the wear and tear is my worry at the moment. Skated them for 2 hour sessions 3 days in a row and showing signs of quick damage already. We'll see how much longer they got.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: One of my favs
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my favs..i have a little wider of a foot and these fit MY feet well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: A little snug but I prefer skate shoes being worn tight.
customer_reviews.author: Bronson

customer_reviews.title: ... at first then stretch out and become floppy not bad but they will not maintain they shape
customer_reviews.text: Tight at first then stretch out and become floppy not bad but they will not maintain they shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Skate Shoe I’ve Ever Had.
customer_reviews.text: Best skate shoe ive ever had. Comfortable and kick flips feel soooo good in these!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: I would order 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews they recommended ordering 1/2 size up I am always a 10.5 I ordered a 11 and they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Louis G.

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Love them but order half a size smaller shoes were too big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sole has a chunk took out of it
customer_reviews.text: They have a chunk out of the sole plus the sole had dirt marks on it same with the top I usually always like emerica shoes an this just disappoints
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Mott

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, they're comfortable, and they're durable. Well worth my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they were already worn with visible damage.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes showed up looking like they were worn already. Scuff marks on the sides and rear of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Meinke

customer_reviews.title: Look great, comfortable, fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are great summer shoes. Look good with many styles. A++
customer_reviews.author: Justin Romine

product_meta.title: Emerica Men's Wino G6 Slip-on Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Slimmed down slip-on from the Wino family. Consists of a heel anchor system and drop-in G6 insole. The Wino G6 slip-on has double wrapped foxing with triangle tread on the bottom to provide maximum feel and grip.
